events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this isn't what I ordered.
The reported issue was identified as a refund request triggered by receiving an incorrect product.
An agent from the refunds specialist team has been assigned to handle this customer request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect product you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and attached is the photo showing the item I got, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund confirmation. I appreciate the support and look forward to getting the money back soon.
The refund process has been successfully started, and you should see the amount credited to your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Since your refund has been processed and you have no further issues, we will now close this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
